title: Hour 1: Thursday Night Thriller
description:
Marcus Spears and Ryan Clark join the show to react to the Chiefs 27-24 win over the Chargers. Find out why despite the loss, Ryan Clark still believes LA will win the AFC West. Plus Marcus Spears and Stephen A. breakdown their thoughts on Robert Sarver's year long suspension. Later, the crew debates if the 49ers made a mistake handing Trey Lance the starting quarterback spot.
